twang.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a quality in the way someone speaks, produced when the air used to speak passes through their nose as well as their mouth
twang.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Her voice had a slight Australian twang.
twang.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a quick ringing sound like the one made by pulling a very tight wire and then suddenly letting it go
twang.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: if you twang something or if it twangs, it makes a quick ringing sound by being pulled and then suddenly let go
